author: CTPPS
body:
Backport of PR #14797 from CMSSW 81X

`Geometry/VeryForwardData/data/2016_ctpps_15sigma_margin0/RP_Dist_Beam_Cent.xml` contains the RP positions for CTPPS physics runs in 2016: 15sigma + zero margin.

(cherry picked from commit 7dab749)
title: CTPPS: XML file with RP positions at 15sigma and no margin - backport of #14797
